description: Retrieves information about the specified kdb user.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the user.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: userName
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the user.

nested_items.name: userArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the user. For more information about ARNs and how to use ARNs in policies, see IAM Identifiers in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: iamRole
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN that is associated with the user.
